subject: Life is like a box of chocolates
message: You never know what you're gonna get.

subject: Obliviate this!
message: Sometimes, you just have to let go and believe in the magic.

subject: Harrison Ford needs your help
message: Dr. Jones,  I need your help locating the Holy Grail.

subject: Needle-sharp advice
message: Always keep your wits about you and a sword by your side.

subject: Summer is coming... eventually
message: Let it go... let your power flow.

subject: Theory of Everything
message: Although unlikely, I believe there is an explanation for everything.

subject: Pickle Rick is back
message: Get ready for a twisted adventure through space and time.

subject: Re: Flux Capacitor
message: Great Scott! We've gotta get back to 1985!

subject: Time Turner dilemma
message: Using a Time Turner is risky, we mustn't change history.

subject: Re: Time travel
message: Nibbler! Stop trying to eat my time travel underwear!

subject: Hakuna Matata
message: No worries, no problems, just relax and float on.

subject: I find your lack of faith disturbing
message: Join me and together we can rule the galaxy.

subject: I am Groot
message: I am Groot. / Am I Groot?
